about_the_game:
Story Plot: At the end of the 24th century, humans succeeded in terraforming Venus and Mars. But just a few decades later, a war broke out when the colonists wanted to gain independence. The War ended in the middle of the 25th century with a peace treaty to end the Solar Federation as well as the sovereignty of Earth. The story begins at the start of the 26th century on Earth. It’s also the 1st century of the new calendar on Mars. The Martians are trying to distinguish themselves from Earth. Our main protagonist is a senator’s assistant. His boss is running for Chancellor this year. One of her promises is to end the legal status of polygamy. But what about the main protagonist? Is he also against polygamy? His decisions will shape the story of Life on Mars.

Depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:

  • Gentleman: The MC is a gentleman.

  • Domination: The MC is rough and dominant, but the women still love him.

  • Sharing & Swinging: The MC shares the women with other men.

  • Beta Male: Depending on your choices, the MC will be just a cuck or become a masochist.

Life on Mars is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:

  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys from touching your women.

  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.

  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Notice:

  • Pregnancy is optional. When the game reaches the final stage, there will be choices for you to decide to impregnate the women or not.

  • If you can't have the endings you want, please use the walkthroughs: one with preview images (you will be able to know how to reach the scenes you want faster) or one without preview images (it won't spoil the story). The walkthroughs are in the game folder. The default location on Windows is: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Life on Mars (MiZtyl)

Since Life on Mars is still being developed, the price of it in the Early Access is lower than the expected price when the full version is out:

  • v0.10: 80% of the expected price.

  • v0.12: 85% of the expected price.

  • v0.14: 90% of the expected price.

  • v0.16: 95% of the expected price.

  • v0.18: 100% of the expected price.

  • v1.0: 100% of the expected price.

The game will be automatically updated for everyone who has already been owning it. Therefore, the sooner you buy Life on Mars, the cheaper it is for you!

Thank you for playing Life on Mars.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!

content_descriptors.notes:
Life on Mars is an erotic Visual Novel and is intended for adults only. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over. It contains adult language, alcohol usage, nudity, sexual themes, sexual situations, sexual penetrations.
More clarification: sexual assault/non-consensual sex in the game only happens as 'groping'. Rapes and other sexual violence aren't available in the game.
And these 'groping scenes' only happen if the gamers want them. Everything depends on the gamers' choices. Nothing can happen if the gamers don't want to.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Life on Mars (MiZtyl)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In Life on Mars, you can have a happy ending (Gentleman Ending or Domination Ending), a neutral ending (Sadist Ending or Sharing & Swinging Ending) or a sad ending (Cuck or Masochist Ending) depending on how you play.
